title: When developing an extension with kotlin quarkus-build-steps.list is not generated correctly
body:
### Describe the bug

When developing a Processor (a class with BuildSteps) in kotlin in `src/kotlin/` instead of `src/java` the build steps are not automatically picked up. (Maven + Gradle)

### Expected behavior

The `META-INF/quarkus-build-steps.list` should correctly contain all Classes that use `@BuildStep` weather they are in `src/java` or `src/kotlin`.

### Actual behavior

No Processor from `src/kotlin` is picked up at all. If that is intended it should be mentioned in the documentation.

### How to Reproduce?

Here is a small reproducer (in maven): [quarkus-kotlin-processor-finding.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/12213255/quarkus-kotlin-processor-finding.zip)
